name: Peanut Butter And A Bit Of Jelly
name_original: Peanut Butter And A Bit Of Jelly
description:
Oh no! The peanut butter is invading bread plains but only YOU can stop them!

Use your cutting-edge knife and your splash of the jelly jar to exterminate all peanut butter from this world!

WASD to move (can change in settings)

Z to switch to knife (can change in settings)

X to switch to the jelly jar (can change in settings)

Click to attack
